tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE threat_intelligence_feeds (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feed_source VARCHAR,
    indicator_type VARCHAR,
    indicator_value VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Indicators (
    indicator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    indicator_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    feed_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (feed_id) REFERENCES ThreatIntelligenceFeeds(feed_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityAnalytics (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    event_description TEXT,
    indicator_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (indicator_id) REFERENCES Indicators(indicator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE indicators (
    indicator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    indicator_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    feed_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (feed_id) REFERENCES threat_feeds(feed_id)
);

CREATE TABLE malware (
    malware_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    malware_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    detection_date DATE NOT NULL,
    indicator_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (indicator_id) REFERENCES indicators(indicator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    incident_date DATE NOT NULL,
    malware_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (malware_id) REFERENCES malware(malware_id)
);

CREATE TABLE threat_indicators (
    indicator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_type VARCHAR(50),
    indicator_value VARCHAR(255),
    related_feed_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (related_feed_id) REFERENCES threat_intel_feed(id)
);

CREATE TABLE security_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    related_indicator_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (related_indicator_id) REFERENCES threat_indicators(indicator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alert_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_message TEXT,
    related_event_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (related_event_id) REFERENCES security_events(event_id)
);
